content.1: At Pulsewave, we specialize in creating extraordinary events in some of the most unique and unexpected venues. From breathtaking rooftop parties to elegant celebrations at historic landmarks like Špilberk Castle and Křižík Fountain, we turn iconic spaces into unforgettable experiences.
content.2: We also host exceptional events at some of Brno's most prestigious cultural venues, including the stunning Moravian Gallery, which houses both Museum of Applied Arts and the Governor’s Palace. These venues offer a sophisticated and artistic backdrop for any event. Another standout location is the impressive Vila Stiassni, a masterpiece of modernist architecture, perfect for exclusive gatherings.
content.3: In collaboration with Maison Club & Lounge, located in the heart of Brno, Pulsewave ensures the afterparty is just as unforgettable, offering an elegant continuation of the celebration. For our Prague events, we partner with Casablanca Sky Bar atop the 5-star Hotel President, where the afterparty takes on a whole new level with breathtaking city views.
content.4: At Pulsewave, we're not just event planners—we're creators of unique experiences. Let us transform your event into something truly extraordinary.
